description:
A frontend for qpm, to provide source and build caching.
			qpmx is designed as a package manager tool without any backend. It is an advanced tool with support for qpm and git package repositories, and provides a bunch of features to make the usage as easy as possible.
			For more details on it's features, check the Project website. But one of it's greatest advantages is the support for caching sources and builds, to speed up development.
author: Skycoder42
